## LocalPermanentStorageService.remove() method

Removes value stored with 'name' from permanent storage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(name: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of stored value that will be removed |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
